articles.content:
Santa Barbara County on Sunday continued to experience an alarming rise in daily COVID-19 cases, with a record-shattering 779 new virus-related infections reported.

articles.title: Missouri flu numbers remain low, easing fears of ‘twindemic’ crowding hospitals - STLtoday.com
articles.description: Influenza cases are the lowest they’ve been in Missouri in at least the last six years, according to infectious disease experts.
